root.name: Super Monkey Ball: Touch & Roll
root.description: OverviewSuper Monkey Ball is a combination of a racing game and a puzzle game. Trapped inside a clear ball, your monkey must complete courses to advance levels. Because the monkey is inside a ball, the challenge arises with the gravitationalÂ inhabitations. As you advance, different complexities arise in the levels, such as shorter platforms and tilting ground. The racing section of the game presents its challenges through sharp curves and short walls which can send you flying into space if your monkey is not positioned correctly.
